otherfeatures: Suitable for Qashqai, Nissan X-Trail / Sunny, C-Triomphe, Peugeot 408 / 307 hatchback / 307CC, Geely Panda / Volvo / Freeship / Emgrand EC825, Lifan 520; Small, ekegant and durable; W/ electronic mark line, can show distance between car tail and rear object on display; Waterproof, dust-proof, fog proof and anti-shock
